烽火四起.definition: the fire of war in all four directions (idiom); the confusion of war

烽煙.definition: fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)

烽煙四起.definition: lit. fire beacons in all four directions (idiom); the confusion of war

烽煙遍地.definition: fire beacons on all sides (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war

烽燧.definition: fire beacon tower (used in frontier regions in former times to relay information about the enemy, using smoke by day and fire at night)
